transArray.content: Very good, good service, rich breakfast, good location, close to the subway

Simple, clear, and powerful! Thank you for choosing to stay at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and giving such a comprehensive review and recognition. Your support is the driving force for our continuous progress. All hotel staff will continue to work hard to provide you with a more comfortable and convenient stay environment. Use us Our attentiveness exchanges for your comfort during your stay. We look forward to your visit every time and wish you a happy holiday! Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
